START: ^Roe: “Hey Mayor uh… I have something to tell you. Nothing bad! Just that I’m part Rock Imp… PLEASE DON’T HATE ME. I’m cousins with the kobolds that come to town to give food too.”
CHOICES: ^Accept him and help him tell others.
Accept: ^“Thanks Mayor, have some dirt cakes for being so nice!”
Accept_and_help: ^“That actually means a lot, I’ll give you my favorite rock for being so nice. His name is Bombabombo and he likes to eat gravel like ME!”
Dont_care: ^“Oh uh sorry for saying anything then…”
